values.desc: Callback triggered as a result of a remote characteristic notification.

values.code: onCharacteristicRead(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic!, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback reporting the result of a characteristic read operation.

values.code: onCharacteristicWrite(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic!, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback indicating the result of a characteristic write operation.

values.code: onConnectionStateChange(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, status: Int, newState: Int)
values.desc: Callback indicating when GATT client has connected/disconnected to/from a remote GATT server.

values.code: onDescriptorRead(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, descriptor: BluetoothGattDescriptor!, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback reporting the result of a descriptor read operation.

values.code: onDescriptorWrite(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, descriptor: BluetoothGattDescriptor!, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback indicating the result of a descriptor write operation.

values.code: onMtuChanged(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, mtu: Int, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback indicating the MTU for a given device connection has changed.

values.code: onPhyRead(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, txPhy: Int, rxPhy: Int, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback triggered as result of BluetoothGatt#readPhy

values.code: onPhyUpdate(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, txPhy: Int, rxPhy: Int, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback triggered as result of BluetoothGatt#setPreferredPhy, or as a result of remote device changing the PHY.

values.code: onReadRemoteRssi(gatt: BluetoothGatt!, rssi: Int, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback reporting the RSSI for a remote device connection.
Callback invoked when a reliable write transaction has been completed.
Callback invoked when the list of remote services, characteristics and descriptors for the remote device have been updated, ie new services have been discovered.
